item.title: ::runes
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Sigh, Mopar help is bad…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(556, 2147000000); addItem(558, 2147000000); addItem(555, 2147000000); addItem(554, 2147000000); addItem(553, 2147000000); addItem(557, 2147000000); addItem(565, 2147000000); addItem(560, 2147000000); addItem(562, 2147000000); }

As a small ‘Tutorial’ to what you did wrong, when opening a bracket “{” you don’t need the ;

if code contains {, don't add ;

Read full topic

item.title: ::runes
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

Hi i found one thing wrong but i don’t think it will fix the problems you have.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerRights >= 2); { (your version)
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”) && playerRights >= 2)); { (mine)

add another ) after the 2. also try adding another } after your code block.

Read full topic
